name: Lilycle Rainbow Stage!!!
notes:
Select the EXE part of the GOG installer and make sure the BIN part is in the same folder.

Installer will throw errors at the end; ignore them.
content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Lilycle Rainbow Stage!!!/LYRSADV.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: $game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
